notes_text: Decriminalized in 2001. Home use and cultivation legal since 21 July 2023.
notes: Decriminalized in 2001. Home use and cultivation legal since 21 July 2023.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Luxembourg}} Decriminalized in 2001.<ref>{{citation |title=Decriminalisation in Europe? |url=https://www.emcdda.europa.eu/attachements.cfm/att_5741_EN_Decriminalisation_Legal_Approaches.pdf |publisher=European Monitoring Centre for Drugs and Drug Addiction |date=November 2001}}</ref> Home use and cultivation legal since 21 July 2023.<ref name="lu" /><ref name="law Luxembourg">{{Cite act |language=fr |date=10 July 2023 |title=Loi du 10 juillet 2023 portant modification de la loi modifiée du 19 février 1973 concernant la vente de substances médicamenteuses et la lutte contre la toxicomanie |trans-title=Law of 10 July 2023 amending the amended law of 19 February 1973 concerning the sale of medicinal substances and the fight against drug addiction |url=https://mj.gouvernement.lu/dam-assets/dossiers/cannabis/loi-du-10-juillet-2023-cannabis.pdf |access-date=2024-01-16 |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240109044110/https://mj.gouvernement.lu/dam-assets/dossiers/cannabis/loi-du-10-juillet-2023-cannabis.pdf |archive-date=2024-01-09}}</ref>
